CORTEX-CORE

     

News and detail analysis site for new age tech, startups, cryptocurrency and metaverse

We are commited to providing quality research articles in the fiels of cyber-security, new age tech, brain-computer iterface and the new emerging sectors of metaverse and augmented and virtual reality.

We are now entering a new digital age an age very different from the before it. How we use technology is going to change now with the advent of VR & AR, the pandemic and increased global tensions.
